==Trivia==
* The Chinese name of the track is a reference to a poem by the Yuan dynasty writer Yuan Jue {{zh|袁桷}}. The original line reads, {{zh|春雨消路尘，春风散林缬|rm=chūnyǔ xiāo lùchén, chūnfēng sàn línxié|tl=the spring rain clears the dust on the road, the spring breeze scatters the stippled light of the forest}}.
